radiographic_examinations.findings: Liver does not show focal lesions or textural abnormality. The gallbladder is moderately distended and contains multiple small stones, with borderline gallbladder wall thickening and no pericholecystic fluid. The pancreas is unremarkable. There is no intrahepatic biliary dilatation. CBD measures 8 mm at the porta hepatis, but only 3 mm in the head of the pancreas. Portal vein is patent with hepatopetal flow. Limited mid sagittal view of the right kidney is unremarkable.
